-- | An HUnit Testable instance for Parsec parser unit tests.
--   
--   An HUnit Testable instance for Parsec parser unit tests.
@package hunit-parsec
@version 0.3

module Test.HUnit.Parsec
data ParsecTest tok st t
ParsecTest :: GenParser tok st t -> st -> [(t, [[tok]])] -> [[tok]] -> ParsecTest tok st t
parser :: ParsecTest tok st t -> GenParser tok st t
initState :: ParsecTest tok st t -> st
positiveCases :: ParsecTest tok st t -> [(t, [[tok]])]
negativeCases :: ParsecTest tok st t -> [[tok]]
instance (Show tok, Eq t, Show t) => Testable (ParsecTest tok st t)
